__e: Betty and I talked it over, and we decided it's time to stop fighting over Archie, and start learning to share.
Archie and I like to take a stroll around town at night.
Meanwhile the doctor gave Archie and me some lessons of our own.
If Archie isn't going to take care of himself, someone else will.
I think we all know that Archie's death was not an accident.
But I realised you wouldn't speak to me for the same reason Archie wouldn't tell us what he'd done with all that money.
